name: VIDEOJAM
description:
VIDEOJAM is a riff on VIDEOBALL by Action Button Entertainment. It plays a bit differently, but borrows a lot of ideas from that game and visually references it.

VIDEOJAM is a 2v2 team sport and requires 4 controllers.

VIDEOJAM was made for the Freeplay 2018 night market.

You can play with (bad) AI by holding down the Y button for 3 seconds in the lobby. Hold down the start button for 3 seconds to reset the game.
